subject: CNN Alerts: bush
body:
CNN Alerts: bush






 



Alert Name: bush
Bush pleads with GOP for patience on Iraq strategy

06/28/07 05:00 PM, EDT
President Bush pleaded for patience on his Iraq strategy Thursday as he scrambled to prevent further defections by fellow Republicans skeptical of his handling of the war.
